title: Battery Drain
description: Interactive p5.js simulation demonstrating how battery discharge rates are affected by motor speed, teaching concepts of power consumption and energy management in robotics.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Battery
Power Consumption
Electric Motor
Robotics
Energy Management
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of battery drain
Explore battery drain through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of battery drain to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on battery drain
